vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὑπέρακμος, ον,
sexually well-developed, [NT+2nd c.AD+]; = Latin exoletus, [Refs]: neuter plural as adverb, ἀκολασταίνοντες ὑ. [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: past one’s prime, getting along in years
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
past one’s prime, getting along in years
past the bloom of life, past one's prime, 1Cor. 7:36*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: más allá de la mejor edad para casarse, pasada la mejor época (de mujeres) ; tener pasiones fuertes (de hombres)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 過了生命中的巔峰時期, 過了適婚年齡, 過了年輕如花的年齡
2) 情慾強烈, 性需求最高的時候 (林前 7:36)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 过了生命中的巅峰时期, 过了适婚年龄, 过了年轻如花的年龄
2) 情欲强烈, 性需求最高的时候 (林前 7:36)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: một người đã qua thời kỳ sung mãn nhất của cuộc đời.
vocabInfos._es_Gloss: ya no estar en la flor de la vida
